channel.title: AdventOfCodes on nathan naveen

item.title: Day 3
item.description: Part One The first solution is pretty simple, so I just brute forced it. func oneDay3() { file, err := os.Open("input3.txt") if err != nil { panic(err) } defer file.Close() scanner := bufio.NewScanner(file) arr := make([]int, 12) gamma := 0 epsilon := 0 pos := 1 for scanner.Scan() { temp := scanner.Text() for i := 0; i < len(temp); i++ { if temp[i] == '1' { arr[i]++ } else { arr[i]-- } } } for i := len(arr) - 1; i >= 0; i-- { if arr[i] > 0 { gamma += pos } else { epsilon += pos } pos *= 2 } fmt.
